item.title: Important torrent concepts
item.description: #internetContent #piracy #programming #computerScience important torrent concepts: Some important concepts to understand when using torrents include: BitTorrent protocol: This is the decentralized peer-to-peer file-sharing protocol that torrenting is based on.

item.title: Quality Dataset gives better language model (phi-1 by microsoft) - arxiv
item.description: #internetContent #computerScience #article Article link: 2306.11644.pdf part 1 phi-1: a new large language model for code. It is trained on a small and high-quality dataset of “textbook quality” data, and achieves state-of-the-art results on code generation tasks with less compute and smaller model size than existing approaches.
